message.name: SUPERVISOR_WORKQUEUE_SENSITIVITY_MISMATCH
message.locale: You do not have the appropriate sensitivity level to view information regarding this work queue.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_WORKQUEUE_TASKS_FOR_USER_NO_ALLOW_SUBSCRIPTION_INDICATOR
message.locale: Only the work queue administrator, and the users subscribed to this work queue can reserve tasks to users, or from this work queue.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_RESERVE_WORKQUEUE_USER_SELECTION_EMPTY
message.locale: Please select a user to reserve tasks to.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_RESERVE_WORKQUEUE_USER_MULTIPLEVALUES
message.locale: Please select one user to reserve tasks to only.

message.name: RESERVE_WORKQUEUE_TASKS_FOR_USER_SENSITIVITY_MISMATCH
message.locale: This user does not have the appropriate sensitivity level to have tasks from this work queue reserved to them.

message.name: SUPERVISOR_RESERVE_WORKQUEUE_TASKS_NO_TASK_SELECTED
message.locale: You have not selected any tasks.
